Package model

Class Sudoku

java.lang.Object
model.AbstractPuzzle
model.AbstractSudoku
model.Sudoku
public final class Sudoku extends AbstractSudoku
Concrete final implementation of AbstractSudoku.

This class provides the following public interface in addition to AbstractSudoku:

  • DEFAULT_SUB_GRID_SIZE and DEFAULT_GRID_SIZE - default value constants
  • getCopy() - for creating new instances with the state of another instance

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Sudoku()

    Creates Sudoku with the specified subGridSize filled with random values in a valid way.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sudoku

      public Sudoku()
      Creates an empty Sudoku with DEFAULT_SUB_GRID_SIZE for its subGridSize and DEFAULT_GRID_SIZE for its gridSize.

    • Sudoku

      public Sudoku​(int subGridSize)
      Creates an empty Sudoku with the specified subGridSize. Its gridSize is the square of subGridSize.

    • Sudoku

      public Sudoku​(int subGridSize, Random random)
      Creates Sudoku with the specified subGridSize filled with random values in a valid way. Its gridSize is the square of subGridSize.
      Parameters:
      random - the Random instance used for filling the Sudoku randomly
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if random is null

  • Method Details

      Specified by:
      getCopy in class AbstractPuzzle

    • hasToValidateBeforeSolve

      protected boolean hasToValidateBeforeSolve()
      Description copied from class: AbstractPuzzle
      Used to determine if there are requirements that need to be fulfilled before solving can be done. If this returns true, the requirements are then checked by AbstractPuzzle.isInvalid(). Implementations should just return a constant value.
      Specified by:
      hasToValidateBeforeSolve in class AbstractPuzzle

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
